name: Angry Birds Coca-Cola
summary: Angry Birds Coca-Cola was a game released on June 11, 2012. This version was made with the corporation of Rovio, Coca-Cola Chinese and "The Chinese Olympic Games' Team". The story is centered at the London Olympic Games on July 27.
